mdRecord.dcterms:title: Memorial tablet to Edmund Minor Wilson,
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Inscription: In Memoriam Edmvndi Minor Wilson MDCCCXCVII-MCMXXXV [1897-1935]. Legum baccalaurei hvivs vniversitatis et ea et maioribvs, filii digni hanc tabvlam posverunt amici amicvm et dvlcem et facetvm festiviqve sermonis et in amiticia bonisove omnibvs fidelem moerentes [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Sculpture and Installations
memorials
plaques (flat objects)
Wilson, Edmund Minor (American lawyer, 1897-1935)
